means: automated support system for utilization review 应用观察自动化支持系统

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"保证"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ensure, insure, assure, guarantee, pledge, promise
means: ensure ： 侧重使人相信某个行为或力量产生的结果。
insure常与ensure换用，但前者多指经济方面的保证、保险。
assure ： 侧重指消除某人思想上的怀疑或担心，从而有达到目的的保证感，但不如ensure普通。
guarantee ： 指对事物的品质或人的行为及履行义务、义务等承担责任的保证。
pledge ： 正式用词，指通过郑重许诺、协议或立誓等保证承担某一义务或遵守某一原则。
promise ： 侧重表自己的主观意向，设法用语言使人感到稳当可靠。

sentence.Network_en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentence.Network_cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentence.Network_en: He hastened to assure me that there was nothing traumatic to report.
sentence.Network_cn: 他急忙向我保证没有什么不快的事情要说。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Brownson, I assure you King's an old enemy of mine.
sentence.Network_cn: 布朗森先生，我向你保证金是我的老冤家。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French assurer, based on Latin ad- 'to' (expressing change) + securus (see secure)

entry.def: If you assure someone that something is true or will happen, you tell them that it is definitely true or will definitely happen, often in order to make them less worried.

example.ex: He hastened to assure me that there was nothing traumatic to report...
example.tran: 他忙不迭地向我保证，并没有什么悲惨的事要诉说。

example.ex: 'Are you sure the raft is safe?' she asked anxiously. 'Couldn't be safer,' Max assured her confidently...
example.tran: “你确定木筏安全吗？”她不安地问道。“再安全不过了，”马克斯信心十足地向她保证道。

entry.def: To assure someone of something means to make certain that they will get it.

example.ex: Last night's resounding victory over Birmingham City has virtually assured them of promotion...
example.tran: 昨晚大胜伯明翰城队实际上已确保他们能够晋级。

example.ex: Ways must be found to assure our children a decent start in life.
example.tran: 必须想办法保证我们的孩子有一个不错的人生开端。

entry.tran: 我可以向你保证；相信我
entry.def: You use phrases such as I can assure you or let me assure you to emphasize the truth of what you are saying.

example.ex: I can assure you that the animals are well cared for...
example.tran: 我可以向你保证动物们得到了精心照顾。

example.ex: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!...
example.tran: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.sentence: "This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us"

means.word_mean: 2. inform positively and with certainty and confidence;

sentences.sentence: "I tell you that man is a crook!"

means.word_mean: 3. assure somebody of the truth of something with the intention of giving the listener confidence;

sentences.sentence: "I assured him that traveling to Cambodia was safe"

means.word_mean: 4. be careful or certain to do something; make certain of something;

sentences.sentence: "He verified that the valves were closed"

means.word_mean: 5. cause to feel sure; give reassurance to;

sentences.sentence: "The airline tried to reassure the customers that the planes were safe"

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑

Sentence.sentence: After outlining the main points she would cover, she assured the audience that she would be happy to answer questions at the end of her presentation.
Recently, the UK National Stem Cell Network warned the UK could lose its place among the world leaders in stem cell research unless adequate funding and legislation could be assured.

means.word_mean: 使相信; 使确信；向...保证

sentences.en: Nothing will assure permanent happiness to me.
sentences.cn: 没有什么能保证我永久的幸福。

sentences.en: She assured us not to worry.
sentences.cn: 她使我们相信不用担心。

jushi.english: The only way to assure success is to work hard.
jushi.chinese: 确保成功的唯一途径是刻苦努力。

jushi.english: The excellent reviews given to the film have assured its success.
jushi.chinese: 对这部影片的好评已使它有把握卖座。
